text: Vladimir (Zev) Zelenko (1973 - June 30, 2022) was a Ukrainian-American physician, writer and conspiracy theorist. He was known for promoting a three- drug combination of hydroxychloroquine, zinc sulfate, and azithromycin as treatment for COVID-19. He also spread misinformation about the COVID-19 vaccination. Zelenko died on June 30, 2022 at age 48, from cancer in New York City. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ukrainian scientists Category:American physicians Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Cancer deaths in New York City
title: Vladimir Zelenko
